header.title: LandPro

intro.title: ACCESSIBLE & TRANSPARENT
intro.text: We imagine a world where climate-smart farmers, foresters, and administrators value and earn from carbon sequestration. They use LandPro to plan carbon-negative interventions, monitor their impacts, and make these gains available in the carbon market. Companies and Governments looking to offset carbon emissions buy these emissions through LandPro, and involve carbon certification agencies to formalize the offset.

introSub.title: The power of A.I. and satellite at your finger-tips
introSub.text: LandPro ESTIMATES how much carbon there is in croplandâ€™s soil and vegetation using A.I. and satellites. This helps farmers DEMONSTRATE how much carbon they are sequestering with their smart farming practices. LandPro CONNECTS Carbon market actors with those smart farmers, FACILITATES the carbon offset process and INCREASE TRANSPARENCY across the carbon cycle

users.title: Who can use LandPro ?
users.text: Most recent satellite images can be used to estimate CO2 in soil & vegetation, using interactive maps and web apps allow to easily reach the user, that can define an area of interest.
users.section1Content: can use LandPro to plan adaptive and sustainable agriculture management, monitor and demonstrate CO2 sequestration efforts.
users.section2Content: can streamline and improve their carbon credit certification process, discover new potential partners on the ground and create portfolios of carbon saving interventions.
users.section3Content: can understand the carbon sequestration potential of their area and the impact of their interventions.

ai.title: Harness A.I. and satellite imaging
ai.text: Robust, well-known and clear methodologies to quickly estimate and measure ground data.

stages.firstText: Select area of interest via phone or computer using satellite RGB images as reference or using spatial vector files
stages.secondText: The algorithm discriminates between different land cover / vegetation types using semantic segmentation
stages.thirdText: Infrared & radar data is used to classify the land productivity over time and space

that is it.title: That's about it!
that is it.text: LandPro tools can be distinctly useful to farmers and land administrators, where the need for accurate, up-to-date data can help families produce more with smaller environmental impact.
